channel.title: Black Mesa Ringtones
channel.description:
Has anybody made any ringtones of the soundtrack? Preferrably Surface Tension 1, On a Rail 2 and On a Rail 2 old? If not, I may attempt to make some and post them here (iPhone format)
EDIT: I made ringtones of a couple of my favorite songs, download them here (iPhone format)
ST1: [url]https://audiko.net/ringtone/Joel+Nielsen/Surface+Tension+1?ring=24188256[/url]
OAR2 Old: [url]https://audiko.net/ringtone/Joel+Nielsen/On+a+Rail+%28old+track%29?ring=24188239[/url]
